home.title: Stroganov Solo Helper
home.play1: Play against Ivan or Katyusha, the Solo Mode opponents of Stroganov.
home.play2: This helper application replaces the automa cards, and helps setting up the game with various difficulty levels.

players.multipleBots: Playing against multiple solo opponents is not supported by the rules. You have to make copies of Ivans player board.

difficultyLevel.title: Difficulty Level
difficultyLevel.mediumInfo: Whenever Ivan doesn’t have the right fur to fully perform his additional action, he gains 1 coin instead.
difficultyLevel.hardInfo: Whenever Ivan gains a fur with the same value as the fur on the trade action space, he gains one coin instead.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
